<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Type-1-error-for-2-day-peeking,-as-a-function-of-the-day">Type 1 error for 2 day peeking, as a function of the day<a class="anchor-link" href="#Type-1-error-for-2-day-peeking,-as-a-function-of-the-day">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [19]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">type1_error</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">days</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">alpha_plot</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">11</span><span class="p">)]</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">d</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">14</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">try</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">H0_positive_sims</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">((</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">()</span> 
        <span class="n">H1_positive_sims</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">((</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">()</span> 
    <span class="k">except</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">break</span>
        
    <span class="n">type1_error</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">100</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">H0_positive_sims</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">number_sims</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">days</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#Plotting    </span>
<span class="n">result_df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">index</span> <span class="o">=</span><span class="n">days</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'type1'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">type1_error</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'alpha'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">alpha_plot</span><span class="p">})</span>    
<span class="n">result_df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">style</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'-'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">':'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'navy'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'red'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">xlabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Day of peek'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ylabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Type I error for 2-day peeking'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">figsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Does-waiting-for-2-or-more-successive-days-with-significant-p-value-help-?">Does waiting for 2 or more successive days with significant p-value help ?<a class="anchor-link" href="#Does-waiting-for-2-or-more-successive-days-with-significant-p-value-help-?">¶</a></h2><p>Instead of ending the experiment once a daily peek is statistically significant, what happens if we require successive days of significant result ? For example, two days with p value < 0.5  ?</p>
<p>Assuming that the decision to end the experiment is made if either:</p>
<ul>
<li>We see D consecutive days with statistically significant p value</li>
<li>OR </li>
<li>Test is stat sig on the last day (when sample size is reached) </li>
</ul>
<p>As we increase the number D consecutive days we decrease the inflated type I error from</p>
<ul>
<li>13% for 2+ consecutive days</li>
<li>6.5% for 6 consecutive days </li>
<li>5.5 for 12 consecutive days </li>
</ul>
<p>If we change the decision logic to ONLY based on consecutive days, then the impact is much stronger on the type 1 error, but at the expense of power. This is expected, since the experiment is under-powered before day 14.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [20]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Transposing table to get columns for each simulation (i.e. 2k cols) and stat sig p values</span>
<span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span>

<span class="c1">#Taken from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/52717996/how-can-i-count-the-number-of-consecutive-trues-in-a-dataframe?noredirect=1&lq=1</span>
<span class="n">b</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">cumsum</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">c</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">b</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sub</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">b</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mask</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ffill</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fillna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mask</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">any</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">consec_true</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mask</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">c</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">max</span><span class="p">(),</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#Save to DF</span>
<span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'max_consec_true'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">consec_true</span>
<span class="k">del</span> <span class="n">df</span>

<span class="c1">#Repeat the above for H1 data</span>
<span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span>
<span class="n">b</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">cumsum</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">c</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">b</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sub</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">b</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mask</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ffill</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fillna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mask</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">any</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">consec_true</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mask</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">c</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">max</span><span class="p">(),</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'max_consec_true'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">consec_true</span>

<span class="c1"># plotting</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">subplots</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">nrows</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ncols</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">figsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">15</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">flatten</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">type1_error</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">days</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">power_list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">alpha_plot</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">14</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">beta_plot</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">80</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">14</span><span class="p">)]</span>


<span class="c1">#Plotting the OR scenario</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">d</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">14</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">type1_error</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">100</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'max_consec_true'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="n">d</span> <span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span> <span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">power_list</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">100</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'max_consec_true'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="n">d</span> <span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span> <span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>                                                                                                        
    <span class="n">days</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">)</span>
   
<span class="n">result_df1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">index</span> <span class="o">=</span><span class="n">days</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'type1'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">type1_error</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'alpha'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">alpha_plot</span><span class="p">})</span>    
<span class="n">result_df2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">index</span> <span class="o">=</span><span class="n">days</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'power'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">power_list</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'1-beta'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">beta_plot</span><span class="p">})</span>    
<span class="n">result_df1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">style</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'-'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">':'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'navy'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'red'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">xlabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Days of consecutive stat sig'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ylabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'error %'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Consecutive days OR last day'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ax</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">result_df2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">style</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'-'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">':'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'darkgreen'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'green'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">xlabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Days of consecutive stat sig'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ylabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'power %'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Consecutive days OR last day'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ax</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>


<span class="c1">#Plotting the CONSECUTIVE ONLY scenario</span>
<span class="n">type1_error</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">days</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">power_list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">d</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">14</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">type1_error</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">100</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'max_consec_true'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="n">d</span> <span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">power_list</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">100</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'max_consec_true'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="n">d</span> <span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>                                                                                                        
    <span class="n">days</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">result_df3</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">index</span> <span class="o">=</span><span class="n">days</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'type1'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">type1_error</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'alpha'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">alpha_plot</span><span class="p">})</span>    
<span class="n">result_df4</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">index</span> <span class="o">=</span><span class="n">days</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'power'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">power_list</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'1-beta'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">beta_plot</span><span class="p">})</span>    
<span class="n">result_df3</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">style</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'-'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">':'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'navy'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'red'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">xlabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Days of consecutive stat sig'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ylabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'error %'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ax</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">result_df4</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">style</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'-'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">':'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'darkgreen'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'green'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">xlabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Days of consecutive stat sig'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ylabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'power %'</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ax</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">])</span>

<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">H0_frame</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">columns</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'max_consec_true'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">H1_frame</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">columns</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'max_consec_true'</span><span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_png output_subarea ">
<img src="data:image/png;base64,
"/>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Can-we-make-early-decisions-when-the-p-values-excede-a-certain-threshold-?">Can we make early decisions when the p-values excede a certain threshold ?<a class="anchor-link" href="#Can-we-make-early-decisions-when-the-p-values-excede-a-certain-threshold-?">¶</a></h1><p>Can we find a trade-off between early decisions (peeking) and experiment velocity ? Are there boundaries and conditions under which we are comfortable peeking and making an early decision ?</p>
<p>For simplicity, let's assume that we are willing to peek only once at 50% of sample size. What is the minimum and maximum p-value for which the type I error and power are within an acceptable range ? (range to be defined)</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Futility-boundary">Futility boundary<a class="anchor-link" href="#Futility-boundary">¶</a></h3><p>Imagine that an experiment has a high p-value at its mid point, how likely is it to turn out to be significant once it concludes ? In other words, can we determine before the end that it is a <em>futile</em> experiment that could be stopped early ?</p>
<p>The answer depends on:</p>
<ul>
<li>The threshold p-value, i.e. the futility threshold: $\lambda$</li>
<li>The true underlying distribution of the variant: $\mu_0$ and $\mu_1$ </li>
</ul>
<p>Let us define the following terms:</p>
<p><strong>Correct futile</strong>: this is an experiment that we choose to stop early which <strong>would not</strong> have been significant on the last day: $p_{50\%} > \lambda$ and $p_{100\%} > \alpha = 0.05$. Correct futile experiments are a benefit as they allow us to iterate quickly.</p>
<p><strong>Incorrect futile</strong>: this is an experiment that we choose to stop early which <strong>would</strong> have been significant on the last day: $p_{50\%} > \lambda$ and $p_{100\%} < \alpha = 0.05$. Incorrect futile experiments are a cost, as they reduce the true power of the experiment (i.e. we fail to detect a true change)</p>
<p>Sources:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://cxl.com/blog/peeking-sequential-testing/">https://cxl.com/blog/peeking-sequential-testing/</a>, </li>
<li><a href="http://blog.analytics-toolkit.com/2017/futility-stopping-rules-agile-ab-testing/">http://blog.analytics-toolkit.com/2017/futility-stopping-rules-agile-ab-testing/</a>
note that correct / incorrect futility is something I came up with.</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="Sample-calculations:-H1-and-H0-scenario">Sample calculations: H1 and H0 scenario<a class="anchor-link" href="#Sample-calculations:-H1-and-H0-scenario">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [21]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Futility threshold = 0.5'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># H1 scenario</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'H1 scenario: mu0 = 0.80, mu1 = 0.81'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># POWER</span>
<span class="c1">#H1 tests that reach p < 0.05 at the end of testday 14 = 784 (78%)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Total tests ='</span> <span class="p">,</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'POWER ='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">100.0</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#FUTILITY</span>
<span class="c1">#H1 tests that had pvalue >0.5 on day 7  = 103 (10.3%)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'FUTILE TESTS = '</span><span class="p">,(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.50</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'FUTILE % = '</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">100.0</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.50</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">/</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#INCORRECT FUTILITY</span>
<span class="c1">#H1 tests that had pvalue >0.5 on day 7  = 103 (10.3%)</span>
<span class="c1"># AND reached p < 0.05 confidence at the end of test = 33</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'INCORRECT FUTILE TESTS ='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">100.0</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.50</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#CORRECT FUTILITY</span>
<span class="c1">#H1 tests that had pvalue >0.5 on day 7  = 103 (10.3%)</span>
<span class="c1"># AND DID NOT reached p < 0.05 confidence at the end of test = 33</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'CORRECT FUTILE TESTS ='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">100.0</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.50</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="c1">####################</span>
<span class="c1"># H0 scenario</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'-----------------'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'H1 scenario: mu0 = 0.80, mu1 = 0.80'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># POWER</span>
<span class="c1">#H1 tests that reach p < 0.05 at the end of testday 14 = 784 (78%)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Total tests ='</span> <span class="p">,</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Type I error ='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">100.0</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#FUTILITY</span>
<span class="c1">#H1 tests that had pvalue >0.5 on day 7  = 103 (10.3%)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'FUTILE TESTS = '</span><span class="p">,(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.50</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'FUTILE % = '</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">100.0</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.50</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">/</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#INCORRECT FUTILITY</span>
<span class="c1">#H1 tests that had pvalue >0.5 on day 7  = 103 (10.3%)</span>
<span class="c1"># AND reached p < 0.05 confidence at the end of test = 33</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'INCORRECT FUTILE TESTS ='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">100.0</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.50</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#CORRECT FUTILITY</span>
<span class="c1">#H1 tests that had pvalue >0.5 on day 7  = 103 (10.3%)</span>
<span class="c1"># AND DID NOT reached p < 0.05 confidence at the end of test = 33</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'CORRECT FUTILE TESTS ='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">100.0</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.50</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>Futility threshold = 0.5
H1 scenario: mu0 = 0.80, mu1 = 0.81
Total tests = 500
POWER = 80.6 %
FUTILE TESTS =  49
FUTILE % =  9.8 %

-----------------
H1 scenario: mu0 = 0.80, mu1 = 0.80
Total tests = 500
Type I error = 5.0 %
FUTILE TESTS =  243
FUTILE % =  48.6 %
INCORRECT FUTILE TESTS = 0.8 %

</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Trade-off-between-correct-and-incorrect-futility">Trade-off between correct and incorrect futility<a class="anchor-link" href="#Trade-off-between-correct-and-incorrect-futility">¶</a></h2><p>Assuming a single, fixed peek at 50% sample size (i.e. day 7 in this simulation), we can vary the threshold $\lambda$ and calculate the trade-off between correct and incorrect futility for both H1 and H0 scenarios</p>
<p>If we wish to keep the number of incorrectly stopped experiments under the alternative hypothesis i.e. H1 incorrect futile, to less than 2%, then we pick a threshold p value on day 7 of p > 0.55</p>
<h2 id="Impact-on-type-I-error-and-power">Impact on type I error and power<a class="anchor-link" href="#Impact-on-type-I-error-and-power">¶</a></h2><p>Combining the futility threshold of a single peek on day 7 with a final reading on day 14, we can calculate the overall impact on type I, type II error and power of peeking vs non peeking. Recall that:</p>
<ul>
<li>False negative (H1) = 1-Power or Type II</li>
<li>True positive (H1) = Power</li>
<li>True negative (H0) </li>
<li>False positive (H0) = Type I error</li>
</ul>
<p>Here we see that for a futility threshold of 0.55, we get:</p>
<p><strong>Pros</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>44% of H0 experiments are correctly stopped on day 7 since they are deemed <em>futile</em></li>
<li>A 0.6% reduction in False Positive (Type I error) from 5% to 4.44%</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Cons</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>A 2% reduction in True Positive (Power) from 79% to 77% in the case of H1</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [22]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Futility cost as a function of day of peek</span>
<span class="c1">#i.e. reduction in power</span>
<span class="n">threshold</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="c1">#days = [6 for d in range(13)]</span>
<span class="n">d</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">6</span>
<span class="n">incorrect_futile_h1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">correct_futile_h1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">incorrect_futile_h0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">correct_futile_h0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

<span class="n">false_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">true_positive_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span> <span class="c1">#H1</span>
<span class="n">true_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">false_positive_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span> <span class="c1">#H0</span>

<span class="n">false_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">true_positive_no_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">true_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">false_positive_no_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>



<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">t</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">threshold</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">days</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="c1">#Peek calculations</span>
    <span class="n">false_negative_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">true_positive_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="n">true_negative_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">false_positive_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="c1">#Futility</span>
    <span class="n">incorrect_futile_h1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">correct_futile_h1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">incorrect_futile_h0</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">correct_futile_h0</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>


    <span class="c1">#No peek calculations</span>
    <span class="n">false_negative_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">true_positive_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="n">true_negative_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">false_positive_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>

        
    
<span class="n">detailed_res_df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s1">'days'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'threshold'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">threshold</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                        <span class="s1">'false_negative_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'true_positive_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_positive_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'true_negative_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'false_positive_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_positive_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'incorrect_futile_h0'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">incorrect_futile_h0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'correct_futile_h0'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">correct_futile_h0</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'incorrect_futile_h1'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">incorrect_futile_h1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'correct_futile_h1'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">correct_futile_h1</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'false_negative_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'true_positive_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_positive_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'true_negative_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'false_positive_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_positive_no_peek</span><span class="p">,})</span>

                       <span class="n">ylabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'</span><span class="si">% o</span><span class="s1">f total'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">xlabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'p value threshold %'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Futility Trade offs - Peek at half point'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Efficacy-boundary">Efficacy boundary<a class="anchor-link" href="#Efficacy-boundary">¶</a></h2><p>Conversely if the experiment has a <em>low</em> p-value at its mid point, can we make an early decision that the experiment is effective and should be rolled out ?</p>
<p>Let us define the following terms:</p>
<p><strong>Correct effective</strong>: experiment that we choose to rollout early which <strong>would</strong> have been significant on the last day: $p_{50\%} < \lambda$ and $p_{100\%} < \alpha = 0.05$. Correct effective experiments are a benefit as they allow us to iterate quickly.</p>
<p><strong>Incorrect effective</strong>: this is an experiment that we choose to rollout early which <strong>would not</strong> have been significant on the last day: $p_{50\%} < \lambda$ and $p_{100\%} > \alpha = 0.05$. Incorrect futile experiments are a cost, as they increase the type I error of the experiment (i.e. false positive)</p>
<p>If we wish to keep the number of incorrectly rolledout experiments under the null hypothesis i.e. H0 incorrect effective, to less than 2%, then we pick a threshold p value on day 7 of p < 0.0.03</p>
<p>This will give us the following impact:</p>
<p><strong>Pros</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>40% of H1 experiments are correctly rolled out on day 7 since they are deemed <em>effective</em></li>
<li>A 1% increase in True Positive (Power) from 79% to 80% in the case of H1 </li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Cons</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>A 2% increase in False Positive (type I error) from 5 to 7% in the case of H0</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [23]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Futility cost as a function of day of peek</span>
<span class="c1">#i.e. reduction in power</span>
<span class="n">threshold</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="c1">#days = [6 for d in range(13)]</span>
<span class="n">d</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">6</span>
<span class="n">incorrect_effective_h1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">correct_effective_h1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">incorrect_effective_h0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">correct_effective_h0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

<span class="n">false_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">true_positive_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span> <span class="c1">#H1</span>
<span class="n">true_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">false_positive_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span> <span class="c1">#H0</span>

<span class="n">false_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">true_positive_no_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">true_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">false_positive_no_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>



<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">t</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mf">0.01</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.015</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.02</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.025</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.03</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.035</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.04</span><span class="p">]:</span>
    <span class="n">threshold</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">days</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="c1">#Peek calculations</span>
    <span class="n">false_negative_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">true_positive_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="n">true_negative_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">false_positive_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="c1">#Efficacy</span>
    <span class="n">incorrect_effective_h1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">correct_effective_h1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">incorrect_effective_h0</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">correct_effective_h0</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>


    <span class="c1">#No peek calculations</span>
    <span class="n">false_negative_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">true_positive_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="n">true_negative_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">false_positive_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>

        
    
<span class="n">detailed_res_df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s1">'days'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'threshold'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">threshold</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                        <span class="s1">'false_negative_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'true_positive_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_positive_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'true_negative_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'false_positive_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_positive_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'incorrect_effective_h0'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">incorrect_effective_h0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'correct_effective_h0'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">correct_effective_h0</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'incorrect_effective_h1'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">incorrect_effective_h1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'correct_effective_h1'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">correct_effective_h1</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'false_negative_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'true_positive_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_positive_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'true_negative_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'false_positive_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_positive_no_peek</span><span class="p">,})</span>

    
<span class="n">detailed_res_df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'threshold'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'correct_effective_h0'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'incorrect_effective_h0'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'correct_effective_h1'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'incorrect_effective_h1'</span><span class="p">],</span> \
                       <span class="n">color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'blue'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'blue'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'green'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'green'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">style</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'-'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">':'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'-'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">':'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">figsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">),</span> \
                       <span class="n">ylabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'</span><span class="si">% o</span><span class="s1">f total'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">xlabel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'p value threshold %'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Efficacy Trade offs - Peek at half point'</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">detailed_res_df</span>
</pre></div>
