<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Peaking-2-times-at-50%-and-75%-of-sample-size">Peaking 2 times at 50% and 75% of sample size<a class="anchor-link" href="#Peaking-2-times-at-50%-and-75%-of-sample-size">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [24]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Futility cost as a function of day of peek</span>
<span class="c1">#i.e. reduction in power</span>
<span class="n">threshold</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="c1">#days = [6 for d in range(13)]</span>
<span class="n">d1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">d2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span>
<span class="n">incorrect_effective_h1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">correct_effective_h1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">incorrect_effective_h0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">correct_effective_h0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

<span class="n">false_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">true_positive_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span> <span class="c1">#H1</span>
<span class="n">true_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">false_positive_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span> <span class="c1">#H0</span>

<span class="n">false_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">true_positive_no_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">true_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">false_positive_no_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

<span class="n">t1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.030</span>


<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">t2</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mf">0.005</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.01</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.015</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.02</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.025</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.03</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.035</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.04</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.045</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">]:</span>
    <span class="n">threshold</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t2</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="c1">#Peek calculations</span>
    <span class="n">false_negative_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="n">t1</span> <span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="n">t2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">true_positive_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">t1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">t2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="n">true_negative_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="n">t1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="n">t2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">false_positive_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">t1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">t2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="c1">#Efficacy</span>
    <span class="n">incorrect_effective_h1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">t1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">t2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">correct_effective_h1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">t1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">t2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">incorrect_effective_h0</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">t1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">t2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">correct_effective_h0</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">t1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">t2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>


    <span class="c1">#No peek calculations</span>
    <span class="n">false_negative_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">true_positive_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="n">true_negative_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">false_positive_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>

        
    
<span class="n">detailed_res_df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s1">'days'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'threshold'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">threshold</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                        <span class="s1">'false_negative_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'true_positive_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_positive_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'true_negative_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'false_positive_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_positive_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'incorrect_effective_h0'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">incorrect_effective_h0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'correct_effective_h0'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">correct_effective_h0</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'incorrect_effective_h1'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">incorrect_effective_h1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'correct_effective_h1'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">correct_effective_h1</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'false_negative_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'true_positive_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_positive_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'true_negative_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'false_positive_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_positive_no_peek</span><span class="p">,})</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">

<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Compensating-for-the-drawbacks-by-increasing-sample-size">Compensating for the drawbacks by increasing sample size<a class="anchor-link" href="#Compensating-for-the-drawbacks-by-increasing-sample-size">¶</a></h2><p>We have seen that the futility boundary causes a 2% drop in power, while the efficacy boundary a 2% increase in type I error. Can we compensate these drawbacks by increasing the overall sample size ?</p>
<p>Let's simulate the effect of increasing the daily sample size by 10% from 1k to 1.1k</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [25]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="o">%%</span><span class="k">time</span>
days = 14
sims = 2000
H0_frame_s, H1_frame_s= np.empty(days).reshape(1,days), np.empty(days).reshape(1,days)

#Looping through simulations
for i in range(sims-1):
    
    x0, x1, x2, x3 = np.empty(0), np.empty(0), np.empty(0), np.empty(0)
    t_test_p_H0, t_test_p_H1, t_test_p_H2 = np.empty(0), np.empty(0), np.empty(0)
    
    #Looping through days 
    for d in range(days):
        #print(d)
        daily_x0 = stats.norm.rvs(loc = mu0, scale =sigma0, size = 1100)
        daily_x1 = stats.norm.rvs(loc = mu1, scale = sigma1, size = 1100)
        daily_x2 = stats.norm.rvs(loc = mu0, scale = sigma0, size = 1100)

        x0 = np.append(x0, daily_x0.copy())
        x1 = np.append(x1, daily_x1.copy())
        x2 = np.append(x2, daily_x2.copy())
        #print(x0.shape)

        t_test_p_H0 = np.append(t_test_p_H0, stats.ttest_ind(x0,x2)[1].copy())
        t_test_p_H1 = np.append(t_test_p_H1, stats.ttest_ind(x0,x1)[1].copy())   
    
    #Stacking sim loop results
    H0_frame_s = np.vstack( (H0_frame_s,t_test_p_H0))
    H1_frame_s = np.vstack( (H1_frame_s,t_test_p_H1 ))

#Saving as DataFrame outside of the sim loop    
H0_frame_s = pd.DataFrame(H0_frame_s)
H1_frame_s = pd.DataFrame(H1_frame_s)
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [26]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Futility cost as a function of day of peek</span>
<span class="c1">#i.e. reduction in power</span>
<span class="n">threshold</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">days</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">d</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">6</span>
<span class="n">incorrect_futile_h1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">correct_futile_h1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">incorrect_futile_h0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">correct_futile_h0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

<span class="n">false_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">true_positive_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span> <span class="c1">#H1</span>
<span class="n">true_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">false_positive_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span> <span class="c1">#H0</span>

<span class="n">false_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">true_positive_no_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">true_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">false_positive_no_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>



<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">t</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mf">0.4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.45</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.55</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.6</span><span class="p">]:</span>
    <span class="n">threshold</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">days</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="c1">#Peek calculations</span>
    <span class="n">false_negative_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s_s</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame_s_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">true_positive_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s_s</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame_s_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="n">true_negative_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s_s</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame_s_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">false_positive_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s_s</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame_s_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="c1">#Futility</span>
    <span class="n">incorrect_futile_h1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s_s</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">correct_futile_h1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">incorrect_futile_h0</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">correct_futile_h0</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>


    <span class="c1">#No peek calculations</span>
    <span class="n">false_negative_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">true_positive_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="n">true_negative_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">false_positive_no_peek</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H0_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H0_frame_s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>

        
    
<span class="n">detailed_res_df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s1">'days'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'threshold'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">threshold</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                        <span class="s1">'false_negative_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'true_positive_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_positive_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'true_negative_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'false_positive_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_positive_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'incorrect_futile_h0'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">incorrect_futile_h0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'correct_futile_h0'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">correct_futile_h0</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'incorrect_futile_h1'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">incorrect_futile_h1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'correct_futile_h1'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">correct_futile_h1</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'false_negative_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'true_positive_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_positive_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                         <span class="s1">'true_negative_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">true_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'false_positive_no_peek'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">false_positive_no_peek</span><span class="p">,})</span>

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Futility cost as a function of day of peek</span>
<span class="c1">#i.e. reduction in power</span>
<span class="n">threshold</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">d</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">6</span>
<span class="n">days</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">incorrect_effective_h1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">correct_effective_h1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">incorrect_effective_h0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">correct_effective_h0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

<span class="n">false_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">true_positive_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span> <span class="c1">#H1</span>
<span class="n">true_negative_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">false_positive_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span> <span class="c1">#H0</span>

<span class="n">false_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">true_positive_no_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">true_negative_no_peek</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">false_positive_no_peek</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[],</span> <span class="p">[]</span>



<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">t</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mf">0.01</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.015</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.02</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.025</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.03</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.035</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.04</span><span class="p">]:</span>
    <span class="n">threshold</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">days</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="c1">#Peek calculations</span>

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">ECDF_vals</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">n</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">arange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">n</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">plot_ECDF</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lab</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'ECDF'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'grey'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ax</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">n</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">arange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">n</span>
    <span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">linestyle</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'none'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">marker</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'.'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">lab</span><span class="p">)</span>  
    <span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_xlabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'p_value'</span><span class="p">);</span> <span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Cumulative probability'</span><span class="p">);</span> <span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'ECDF'</span><span class="p">);</span> <span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">legend</span><span class="p">();</span>
    
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [29]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">day</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">13</span>
<span class="n">ecdf</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ECDF_vals</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">day</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">percentiles_diff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">percentile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">day</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mf">2.5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">97.5</span><span class="p">])</span>

<span class="c1"># Left hand graph: distribution</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">ax1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax2</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">subplots</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">nrows</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ncols</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">figsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">15</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">sns</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">histplot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">day</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">bins</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ax1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'dist'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">axvline</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'red'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">linestyle</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">':'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'alpha'</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="n">ax1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_xlim</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'H1: Distribution p values day </span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">day</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">ax1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">legend</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># Right hand graph: CDF</span>
<span class="n">plot_ECDF</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">day</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ax2</span> <span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">axvline</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'red'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">linestyle</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">':'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'alpha'</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="n">ax2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">legend</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1">#ax1.axvline(x= percentiles_diff[0], color = 'red');</span>
<span class="c1">#ax1.axvline(x= percentiles_diff[1], color = 'red');</span>



<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Taken-from-#https://cxl.com/blog/peeking-sequential-testing/">Taken from #<a href="https://cxl.com/blog/peeking-sequential-testing/">https://cxl.com/blog/peeking-sequential-testing/</a><a class="anchor-link" href="#Taken-from-#https://cxl.com/blog/peeking-sequential-testing/">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [30]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># POWER</span>
<span class="c1">#H1 tests that reach p < 0.05 at the end of testday 14 = 784 (78%)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Total tests ='</span> <span class="p">,</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'POWER ='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">100.0</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#FUTILITY</span>
<span class="c1">#H1 tests that had pvalue >0.5 on day 7  = 103 (10.3%)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'FUTILITY: p > 0.5 on day 7'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'FUTILE TESTS = '</span><span class="p">,(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.50</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'FUTILE % = '</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">100.0</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.50</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">/</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#INCORRECT FUTILITY</span>
<span class="c1">#H1 tests that had pvalue >0.5 on day 7  = 103 (10.3%)</span>
<span class="c1"># AND reached p < 0.05 confidence at the end of test = 33</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'INCORRECT FUTILE TESTS ='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">100.0</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.50</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#CORRECT FUTILITY</span>
<span class="c1">#H1 tests that had pvalue >0.5 on day 7  = 103 (10.3%)</span>
<span class="c1"># AND DID NOT reached p < 0.05 confidence at the end of test = 33</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'CORRECT FUTILE TESTS ='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">100.0</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.50</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>Total tests = 500
POWER = 80.6 %
FUTILITY: p > 0.5 on day 7
FUTILE TESTS =  49
FUTILE % =  9.8 %
INCORRECT FUTILE TESTS = 4.2 %
CORRECT FUTILE TESTS = 5.6 %
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [31]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Futility cost as a function of day of peek</span>
<span class="c1">#i.e. reduction in power</span>
<span class="n">threshold</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">days</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">correct_futile</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">incorrect_futile</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">d</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">t</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">threshold</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">days</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">incorrect_futile</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
        <span class="n">correct_futile</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">H1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
<span class="n">futility_result_H1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s1">'days'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">days</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'threshold'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">threshold</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'correct_futile'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">correct_futile</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'incorrect_futile'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">incorrect_futile</span><span class="p">})</span>
<span class="n">futility_result_H1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">head</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">50</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Multiple-Variants-and-Bonferroni-correction">Multiple Variants and Bonferroni correction<a class="anchor-link" href="#Multiple-Variants-and-Bonferroni-correction">¶</a></h1><p>Assume that we have several variants, each of which have no true effect. We conclude the experiment if any of the variants are statistically significant on day 14, what is the true type 1 error ?</p>
<ul>
<li>x0 corresponds to the control with mean = 0.8</li>
<li>x1 corresponds to a variant1 with true mean = 0.8</li>
<li>x2 corresponds to a variant2 with true mean = 0.8</li>
</ul>
<p>We see here that with two variants, by keeping $\alpha = 0.5$, we inflate the type 1 error to 8.9% instead of 5%. This issue is the well known <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiple_comparisons_problem">multiple comparison problem</a>. On solution is to adjust $\alpha$ with the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bonferroni_correction">bonferroni correction</a> such that:</p>
<p>$\alpha_b = \frac{\alpha}{m}$</p>
<p>where $m$ is the number of comparisons (i.e. variants)</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [32]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="o">%%</span><span class="k">time</span>
days = 14
sims = 1000
V1_frame, V2_frame = np.empty(days).reshape(1,days), np.empty(days).reshape(1,days)

#Looping through simulations
for i in range(sims-1):
    
    x0, x1, x2 = np.empty(0), np.empty(0), np.empty(0)
    t_test_p_V1, t_test_p_V2 = np.empty(0), np.empty(0)
    
    #Looping through days 
    for d in range(days):
        #print(d)
        daily_x0 = stats.norm.rvs(loc = mu0, scale =sigma0, size = 1000)
        daily_x1 = stats.norm.rvs(loc = mu0, scale = sigma1, size = 1000)
        daily_x2 = stats.norm.rvs(loc = mu0, scale = sigma0, size = 1000)

        x0 = np.append(x0, daily_x0.copy())
        x1 = np.append(x1, daily_x1.copy())
        x2 = np.append(x2, daily_x2.copy())
        #print(x0.shape)

        t_test_p_V1 = np.append(t_test_p_V1, stats.ttest_ind(x0,x1)[1].copy())
        t_test_p_V2 = np.append(t_test_p_V2, stats.ttest_ind(x0,x2)[1].copy())   
    
    #Stacking sim loop results
    V1_frame = np.vstack( (V1_frame,t_test_p_V1))
    V2_frame = np.vstack( (V2_frame,t_test_p_V2 ))

#Saving as DataFrame outside of the sim loop    
V1_frame = pd.DataFrame(V1_frame)
V2_frame = pd.DataFrame(V2_frame)
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>CPU times: user 34.4 s, sys: 237 ms, total: 34.7 s
Wall time: 43.5 s
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Bonferroni-correction">Bonferroni correction<a class="anchor-link" href="#Bonferroni-correction">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [33]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Calculations</span>
<span class="n">number_sims</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">V1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">number_days</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">V1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span> <span class="c1">#Number of variants</span>


<span class="c1"># i.e. True type 1 error in this scenario compared to expected</span>
<span class="n">positive_sims</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">V1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">V2_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'True type 1 error when comparing two variants to the control:'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'True ='</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">100</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">positive_sims</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">number_sims</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'%, Expected ='</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">100</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">alpha</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">()</span>


<span class="c1"># i.e. True type 1 error with Bonferroni correction</span>
<span class="n">positive_sims</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">V1_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">m</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">V2_frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">m</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'True type 1 error with Bonferroni correction:'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'True ='</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">100</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">positive_sims</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">number_sims</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'%, Expected ='</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">100</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">alpha</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'%'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>True type 1 error when comparing two variants to the control:
True = 8.3 %, Expected = 5.0 %

True type 1 error with Bonferroni correction:
True = 3.8 %, Expected = 5.0 %
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Experiment-2)-Two-groups,-same-average,-50/50%,-comparing-superiority">Experiment 2) Two groups, same average, 50/50%, comparing superiority<a class="anchor-link" href="#Experiment-2)-Two-groups,-same-average,-50/50%,-comparing-superiority">¶</a></h2><p>The main difference with experiment 1 is that we are testing for superiority of a specific margin $\delta$</p>
<ul>
<li>$H_0$: $\mu_1 - \mu_0 < \delta$</li>
<li>$H_1$: $\mu_1 - \mu_0 \geq \delta$</li>
<li>Where $\delta = 0.01$ </li>
<li>Type 1 error is calculated as: $P(\text{reject} | H_0)$</li>
<li>Power is calculated as: $P(\text{reject} | H_1)$</li>
</ul>
<p>For $\mu_0 = 0.8 $ and $\mu_1 = 0.81$ then we cannot measure the difference. For For $\mu_0 = 0.8 $ and $\mu_1 = 0.82$ we need 14k users to achieve 80% power, a similar magnitude to the previous experiment, but with double the true difference between populations.</p>
<p><a href="http://powerandsamplesize.com/Calculators/Compare-2-Means/2-Sample-Non-Inferiority-or-Superiority">Link</a></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [34]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Z_crit</span>
<span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">.</span><span class="mi">05</span>
<span class="n">beta</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.2</span> <span class="c1">#Power = 1-beta</span>
<span class="n">delta</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.01</span>

<span class="c1">#Paramaters</span>
<span class="n">mu0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">mu1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.80</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.82</span>
<span class="n">sigma0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">sigma1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.3</span>
<span class="n">n0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10000</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10000</span>

<span class="c1">#Intermediate calculations</span>
<span class="n">z_alpha2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">stats</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ppf</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">loc</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">scale</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">z_beta</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">stats</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ppf</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">beta</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">loc</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">scale</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">kappa</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">n0</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">n1</span>
<span class="n">sigma_pooled</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sqrt</span><span class="p">((</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n0</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">sigma0</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n1</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">sigma1</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span> <span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n0</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="n">n1</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="p">)</span>


<span class="c1">#Manual power</span>
<span class="c1">#from http://powerandsamplesize.com/Calculators/Compare-2-Means/2-Sample-Equality</span>
<span class="n">z</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mu1</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">mu0</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">delta</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">sigma_pooled</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sqrt</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">n0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">n1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">power_manual</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">stats</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">cdf</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">z</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">z_alpha2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">loc</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">scale</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">stats</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">cdf</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">z</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">z_alpha2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">loc</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">scale</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#Manual sample size given power</span>
<span class="n">sample_size_n1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">kappa</span><span class="p">)</span>  <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">sigma_pooled</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">z_alpha2</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">z_beta</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mu1</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">mu0</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">delta</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span>
<span class="n">sample_size_n0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">kappa</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">sample_size_n1</span>

<span class="c1">#Using statsmodel and standardized effect size, difference between the two means divided by the standard deviation. effect_size has to be positive.</span>
<span class="n">power_statsmodel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">statsmodels</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">stats</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">power</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">tt_ind_solve_power</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">effect_size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mu1</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">mu0</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">sigma_pooled</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">nobs1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">n1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ratio</span> <span class="o">=</span><span class="n">n1</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">n2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.05</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">power</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alternative</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'two-sided'</span> <span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#print('z_alpha/2 = ',z_alpha2, '  z = ', z)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Sample size for 80% power: n0='</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">round</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sample_size_n1</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s1">'and n1 ='</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nb">round</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sample_size_n0</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Power for given sample size = '</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">round</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">power_manual</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

entry.title: Comparing t-test and Mann Whitney test for the means of Gamma
entry.summary: This notebook explores various simulations where we are testing for the difference in means of two independent gamma distributions, by sampling them and computing the means of each sample. We will compare two main test methods: the t-test and the Mann Whitney test.

  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
